title: Shadowed
description: Brynn of Haversey is a spirit whisperer, meaning she can talk to ghosts. And date them. And well, other things, too. Steamy things.  Sorry, spoiler seekers! That's all the info you get for now!  ***OFFICIAL BLURB COMING SOON!***  SHADOWED is book three in THE ACADEMY OF SPIRITS AND SHADOWS series. This is a full-length reverse harem fantasy romance with action, magic, and steamy scenes.
author: C.M. Stunich
